name: BGK Ortho 3×11
author: Barnaby Kendall

There are four layers:

  • 􀅯 — Default alphanumeric keys
  • 􀗢 — Function (Fn) layer (top left orange legends)
  • 􀃫 — Number Pad (NP) (bottom left blue legends)
  • 􀍱 — Meta layer (bottom purple legends)

Notes:

  • Encoder replaces first key on one of the top three rows.
  • Bottom right legends indicate modifier when held.
  • Fn layer can be accessed from NP.
  • Meta layer is accessed by pressing 􀃫 while 􀗢 is held.
  • NP and Meta layers can be toggled on with three taps
  • Unmarked keys on NP and Meta layers have no action. However, Shift on NP is Shift+Default layer key (e.g., Shift+􀃠 is ‘*’) for all keys.
  • Right Alt (Option) on Fn layer is Right Alt+Default layer key (e.g., RAlt+F3 is ‘£’).
  • Application shortcuts on Meta layer are actually function keys that trigger HotKey App actions.
